title: About Nico Negrete
subtitle: Passionate Software Engineer with nearly 4 years of experience developing web applications and backend systems using technologies like React, Spring, and Python (Flask). I focus on writing clear, maintainable code that’s easy to debug and scales well. Comfortable working both independently and within teams, I’m dedicated to delivering polished, high-quality products that make an impact. My goal is to bring sleek, effective solutions to digital media and tech projects, blending technical expertise with a drive for meaningful results.
